inclusion.criterion: Male and female between 18 - 50 years old
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: AOH stage 1 or 2 according to Ficat
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Specific aetiology of AOH already known
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Hyper sensibility or allergy already known to ibandronate
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Contra-Indications to an MRI (Pacemaker, cochlear implant...)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has Paget's disease of bone and is starting Bisphosphonate therapy. His sister had the same problems.
